user.description: Please enter your API token from your [Kassalapp profile page]({settings_url})

search.name: Search string
search.description: Search for products based on a keyword. The keyword must be a string with a minimum length of 3 characters.

excl_allergens.name: Allergens (excl)
excl_allergens.description: Exclude specific allergens from the products.

incl_allergens.name: Allergens (incl)
incl_allergens.description: Include only specific allergens in the products.

exclude_without_ean.name: Require EAN
exclude_without_ean.description: If true, products without an EAN number are excluded from the results.

size.name: Size
size.description: The number of products to be displayed per page.

sort.name: Sort
sort.description: Sort the products by a specific criteria.

unique.name: Unique
unique.description: If true, the product list will be collapsed based on the EAN number of the product.
